p: Coronavirus (COVID‐19) has been one of the most important issues across the world (see e.g., 1 , 2 , 3 , 4 , 5 ). As of 18 June 2020, according to the Johns Hopkins Coronavirus Resource Centre, more than 8.28 million cases have been reported across 188 countries, resulting in more than 446,000 deaths. COVID‐19 is considered as one of the worst viruses in human history since it has a dominant contagious disease and infection fatality rate.
